title: Chemistry Laboratory Education Methods and Tools: Mobile-Based Hybrid E-Learning Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Blended education program for current chemical industry professionals, conducted in a smartphone-centric environment. Designed with Computer-Assisted Training (CAT) materials combined with synchronous/asynchronous interactions

learning_goals: Learners acquire theoretical knowledge of chemical experiment design and safety protocols in mobile environments with over 90% mastery.
Learners perform three or more virtual experiment scenarios using CAT-based simulation tools.
It improves experimental report writing skills by 80% through an asynchronous feedback system.
Learners lead discussions on chemical experiment pedagogy at least twice via real-time online collaboration.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
